# The `M68k.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file contains the entry points for global functions defined in the M68k target library, as used by the LLVM JIT. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Namespaces Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="namespace"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a></>}>
This is an optimization pass for GlobalISel generic memory operations. <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

This file contains the entry points for global functions defined in the M68k target library, as used by the LLVM JIT.
